rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with a foyer area leading to the living room and dining areas.
Open-concept living space designed for family gatherings and entertainment; includes an adjoining open dining area.
Separate dining area integrated with the living room.
Efficient kitchen layout with modular cabinetry and a semi-open design to connect with the living space.
Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom following Vastu guidelines for auspicious energy flow.
Additional bedroom suitable for children or guests.
Another bedroom with ample space, aligning with Vastu principles by placing it in the northeastern direction.
Guest room designed for occasional visitors and family guests.
Primary bathroom shared by the family; additional bathrooms can be added on the upper floor if needed.
Multipurpose utility room including storage for cleaning supplies and home appliances.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed to welcome positive energy following Vastu principles.
Access opening leading to a small garden and exterior courtyard space for relaxation.

roof Terrace.description: Rooftop terrace with seating area and garden pots offering an urban farming feel; designed with cost-effective materials.

rooms.description: En-suite master bedroom on first floor, with additional storage and a private balcony.
Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom.

openings.location: east side of ground floor adjacent to living room
openings.description: Staircase connecting the two levels with sufficient headroom and safety considerations.

rooms.description: Rooftop terrace serving as an outdoor garden and recreational space.
